ComicInfo.Summary: Running from the cannibals, our five heroes are scattered across the desertâ€”one lost in a series of dark tunnels, one hiding under a film trailer, two stuck up on top of a hill, and one captured by the cannibal cult! How will they ever reunite...and what are the Children of the Radiant Dawn really up to?
